summary: User wants to obtain/share the full Version 11 project code and requests generating a folder/package containing all files for sharing (e.g., via WhatsApp/laptop).

existing_features.title: Add a new repository folder that contains a complete, shareable snapshot of the Version 11 project files (backend + frontend + project metadata) in the same directory structure as the app.

Include a single README in the export folder with English instructions for how to share the exported project without formatting changes (including WhatsApp-safe copying guidance) and how to compress the folder into a ZIP on common operating systems.

new_feature_requests.summary: Generate a single folder/package (e.g., ZIP) containing all Version 11 files for easy sharing/export

projectName: Create a shareable Version 11 export folder containing all project files
